Title: My Team Is Dropping the Ball (I’m Pissed)
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about: 

  • A business owner who’s upset with his team's underperformance  
  • A manager who’s frustrated that he works harder in the family business than his cousins 
  • A young leader seeking advice on transitioning into her new role 
  • Why Dave Ramsey believes the customer is not always right
